com.armandorv.cnpd.web.server.smack
Class SmackSupport

java.lang.Object
  com.armandorv.cnpd.web.server.smack.SmackSupport
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChatServiceImpl
public abstract class SmackSupport
extends java.lang.Object

Template method class which give support for smack operations, smack is an XMPP client used in this application to connect against Google Talk XMPP server. This class hold a map with a connection per connected user.

Author:
armandorv
